__e: And screw your mom. 'Cause believe it or not, all that crap that happened to you made you exactly who you are.
Everything that's happened to me has made me who I am, - but it can't explain what I've become.
She says she can't imagine now what she'll say to her son when he's old enough to understand what's happened to him.
It was the day before his 100th birthday, and you were worried... something might have happened to him.
Miles asked me not to say anything but I haven't heard from him and I think something might have happened to him.
You got a death wish, Professor. Something must've happened in your life that hurt you, just like us.
If anything had happened to you and I hadn't said something that could've helped...
What would you have told her father if something had happened to her?
I don't know what I would do if anything happened to her.
